ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Thanks to Katharina Schulte (James Cook University, Townsville, Queensland, Australia) who provided the developing coconut fruits which were used in this study. We would like to thank Qing Liu and Madeline Mitchell for their time and critical review of the manuscript before submission.

sec.title: Disclosures
sec.p: The authors have no conflicts of interest to declare.
